revised_title: Volcanism and Geological Evolution of the Kenya Rift Valley
tldr: The authors discuss the volcanic history and geological evolution of the Kenya Rift Valley, a sector of the East African Rift System. They describe the diverse volcanic rocks, their compositions, and forms, as well as the structural and stratigraphic features of the region. The study highlights the continuous volcanic activity from Miocene times to the present day and the distinct petrochemical evolution from Miocene to Pleistocene in the northern Kenya Rift.
